home.secure_transaction_description: Security and privacy of your online transaction are protected by RapidSSL authorized technology. Receive instant confirmation and e-ticket directly in your email.
home.assistance_and_support_description: We can help you navigate changes in travel plans, flight delays, cancellations, or unforeseen circumstances.
home.various_payment_option_description: Easy transaction with various payment options from ATM Transfer, Credit Card to Internet Banking.
